com.bmc.arsys.api

Interface Version


  • public interface Version
    The Version interface contains the AR Java API version string.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String clientVersion
      Java API Version number including drop version
      static String shortClientVersion
      Short client version - only major and minor rev, no drop version not padded to 2 decimal places, no space before major version

    • Field Detail

      • clientVersion

        static final String clientVersion
        Java API Version number including drop version
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • shortClientVersion

        static final String shortClientVersion
        Short client version - only major and minor rev, no drop version not padded to 2 decimal places, no space before major version
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
